title: Selenium firefox loads wrong URLs
body:
### ⚠️ Search for existing issues first ⚠️

- [X] I have searched the existing issues, and there is no existing issue for my problem

### Which Operating System are you using?

Windows

### Which version of Auto-GPT are you using?

Latest Release

### GPT-3 or GPT-4?

GPT-3.5

### Steps to reproduce 🕹

Setup a new AutoGPT:

```
ai_name: someai
ai_role: an AI designed to browse the web and do independent research
ai_goal: Find all the information you can on the website www.steinhaug.no and save it to
  "steinhaug.txt"
```

.env
```
        USER_AGENT="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/112.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"
        HEADLESS_BROWSER=True
        USE_WEB_BROWSER=firefox
```

As soon as you start the AutoGPT and the first browse_website command is issued, the wrong URL is loaded. Its not loading the URL defined in arguments[url], instead it loads "https://" + USER_AGENT from the .env file.


### Current behavior 😯

When selenium webdriver is opening firefox for the a arguments[url] in the NEXT ACTION,
another URL is opened instead. Basically: http://USER_AGENT

This fails, on the second try however it also fails - but manages to redirect to the correct arguments[url], however at this time the arguments[question] have changed from the original one.

### Expected behavior 🤔

When selenium webdriver is opening firefox for the URL from arguments[url] in the NEXT ACTION, 
The arguments[url] should be opened in the browser.


### Your prompt 📝

```yaml
ai_goals:
- Find all the information you can on the website www.steinhaug.no and save it to
  "steinhaug.txt"
- Find all the information you can on the YouTube channel @kimsteinhaug and save it
  to "steinhaug.txt"
- Write a structured report on Steinhaug ut på eventyr from "steinhaug.txt". Save
  to file
- Shutdown upon achieving the goal'
ai_name: 'Researcher420 '
ai_role: an AI designed to browse the web and do independent research
```


### Your Logs 📒

```log
2023-04-29 05:47:57,990 INFO Welcome back!  Would you like me to return to being Researcher420 ?
2023-04-29 05:48:39,759 INFO Using memory of type: LocalCache
2023-04-29 05:48:39,925 INFO Using Browser: firefox
2023-04-29 05:48:58,062 INFO  THOUGHTS: I will start by browsing the website www.steinhaug.no to gather information and save it to a file. Then, I will search for the YouTube channel @kimsteinhaug and save the information to the same file. Finally, I will write a structured report on Steinhaug ut på eventyr from the information gathered in the file.
2023-04-29 05:48:58,699 INFO REASONING: Browsing the website and YouTube channel will provide me with the necessary information to write a report on Steinhaug ut på eventyr.
2023-04-29 05:48:59,182 INFO PLAN: 
2023-04-29 05:48:59,228 INFO -  Browse www.steinhaug.no and save information to file
2023-04-29 05:48:59,509 INFO -  Search for @kimsteinhaug on YouTube and save information to file
2023-04-29 05:48:59,792 INFO -  Write a structured report on Steinhaug ut på eventyr from the information gathered in the file
2023-04-29 05:49:00,169 INFO CRITICISM: I need to ensure that the information I gather is relevant to Steinhaug ut på eventyr and that I do not exceed my short term memory limit.
2023-04-29 05:49:00,673 INFO NEXT ACTION:  COMMAND = browse_website  ARGUMENTS = {'url': 'https://www.steinhaug.no', 'question': 'all information'}
2023-04-29 05:49:11,374 INFO -=-=-=-=-=-=-= COMMAND AUTHORISED BY USER -=-=-=-=-=-=-= 
2023-04-29 05:49:25,713 INFO SYSTEM:  Command browse_website returned: Error: Message: Reached error page: about:neterror?e=dnsNotFound&u=http%3A//user-agent%3Dmozilla/5.0%2520%28Windows%2520NT%252010.0%3B%2520Win64%3B%2520x64%29%2520AppleWebKit/537.36%2520%28KHTML%2C%2520like%2520Gecko%29%2520Chrome/112.0.5615.49%2520Safari/537.36&c=UTF-8&d=Vi%20klarte%20ikke%20finne%20serveren%20p%C3%A5%20user-agent%3Dmozilla.
Stacktrace:
RemoteError@chrome://remote/content/shared/RemoteError.sys.mjs:8:8
WebDriverError@chrome://remote/content/shared/webdriver/Errors.sys.mjs:182:5
UnknownError@chrome://remote/content/shared/webdriver/Errors.sys.mjs:509:5
checkReadyState@chrome://remote/content/marionette/navigate.sys.mjs:61:24
onNavigation@chrome://remote/content/marionette/navigate.sys.mjs:329:39
emit@resource://gre/modules/EventEmitter.sys.mjs:154:20
receiveMessage@chrome://remote/content/marionette/actors/MarionetteEventsParent.sys.mjs:35:25
```
